abstract: Jeffry Picower, a prominent philanthropist and one of the largest investors in the vast Ponzi scheme run by Bernard L. Madoff, was found dead in the pool at his Palm Beach, Fla., home on Sunday afternoon.

lead_paragraph: Update | 6:12 p.m. Jeffry Picower, a prominent philanthropist and one of the largest investors in the vast Ponzi scheme run by Bernard L. Madoff, was found dead in the pool at his Palm Beach, Fla., home on Sunday afternoon, The New York Times’s Diana B. Henriques reported.

headline.main: Picower, Billionaire Madoff Investor, Found Dead
